title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When trying to modify a parameter in the Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values are not displayed. Instead, all the value boxes are empty.
EB: The Show Report Parameters' dialog should display the default values in the value boxes, allowing the user to modify specific parameters without having to input all values.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Preview the report. 
2. Click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button. 
3. Observe that the value boxes in the Enter Parameters dialog are empty instead of showing the default values.
